Entries.262213017/e 262213016/A AdvAbiFirstMine/: continue/7 13/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail 4 14 2 Marlon 2 14 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiWeapons 5/skippable/fade/pause 400/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/emote Abigail 8/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19/move farmer 0 -5 0/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/emote Abigail 8/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/speak Abigail "@!#$b#Marlon is teaching me about weapons today."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Marlon "Choosing the appropriate weapon for your fighting style, as well as caring for it properly, is essential to succeeding as an adventurer."/pause 200/speak Abigail "I already know which one I want!#$b#He showed me a lava katana earlier!$1"/pause 200/emote Marlon 28/pause 200/speak Marlon "We'll... work up to that one.#$b#But you're making good progress with the basics."/pause 200/speak Abigail "What weapon do you like to use @?"/pause 200/quickQuestion What's your fighting style?#This sword I picked up off the ground works well enough.#I let my fists do the talking.#I've got a lava katana! It's loads of fun!#I like the precision I get with my dagger.#This club may look heavy but it gets the job done.#I can get some good hits in with my slingshot.#Oh I've just got this old purple thing I found in the desert.#May I present, THE INFINITY BLADE!(break)speak Abigail "Wow, did you find that in the mines?"(break)speak Abigail "That sounds... painful.$6"(break)speak Abigail "Awesome! We should totally train together!$1"(break)speak Abigail "And sneak up on enemies like an assassin? That's pretty cool.$1"(break)speak Abigail "Wow, how do you lug that thing around all day?$1"(break)speak Abigail "That looks kind of hard to aim, but at least you can use rocks for ammo!$1"(break)speak Abigail "I love the color! This might be my new favorite.$1"\speak Marlon "Hmm...#$b#Interesting."(break)speak Abigail "WOW! That thing looks powerful!$7"\speak Marlon "Incredible!#$b#That's a legendary weapon, @.#$b#I was not aware you were in possession of one!#$b#I would be honored to look it over sometime."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Abigail "I can't wait to get something cooler than this basic sword."/pause 200/speak Marlon "Speaking of that sword, have you been sharpening it regularly like I told you to?"/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 300/speak Abigail "Uhh...$1"/pause 200/emote Marlon 28/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213018/e 262213017/A AdvAbiWeapons/p: continue/7 13/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail 4 11 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiShop 7/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19/faceDirection farmer 0/emote Abigail 16/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 100/speak Abigail "Hi @!"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Abigail "Marlon's out right now.#$b#He wants me to get some practice managing guild operations, so I'm going to start handling the front desk sometimes.#$b#Gil's still here if something comes up that I don't know how to deal with yet.#$b#If I can prove I've got things under control here, I might even convince Marlon to take a vacation for a change!$1#$b#He really needs one."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "So, what do you need?"/pause 200/message "Abigail will now handle the guild desk once a month!"/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262213019/e 262213018/A AdvAbiShop/p Abi: continue/20 8/farmer 18 13 0 Abigail 21 8 0 Marlon 21 6 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiSpar 7/skippable/fade/pause 300/move farmer 0 -6 1 true/speak Marlon "Alright, now aim for my left knee."/pause 200/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7/playSound swordswipe/pause 200/speak Marlon "That was too low.#$b#Make sure you're using the full range of your arm!"/pause 200/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7/playSound swordswipe/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7/playSound swordswipe/pause 200/speak Marlon "Good, now try my other leg. Be sure to mind your footwork."/pause 200/positionOffset Abigail 0 8/pause 200/positionOffset Abigail 0 -16/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7/playSound swordswipe/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7/playSound swordswipe/positionOffset Abigail 0 8/pause 200/animate Abigail false false 900 21 22 21 22 21 22/emote Abigail 28/animate Abigail false false 900 21 22 21 22 21 22 21 22/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 100/speak Marlon "Let's end here for today."/pause 200/speak Abigail "...I think I've got a few rounds left in me.$3"/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "@, what do you think?"/pause 200/quickQuestion Should Abigail continue?#I think she can push a bit longer.#It's important to take breaks.#It's her choice.(break)emote Marlon 56\pause 200\speak Marlon "Very well, try aiming for my left arm this time."\pause 200\positionOffset Abigail 0 12\pause 200\specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7\playSound swordswipe\positionOffset Abigail 0 -12(break)emote Abigail 56\pause 200\speak Abigail "Okay, okay, I'll get some rest and get back to training later. Sound good?"\pause 200\emote Marlon 32(break)emote Abigail 20\friendship Abigail 100\pause 200\speak Abigail "I'll do a couple more drills and then call it a day, sound good?"\pause 200\emote Marlon 32\pause 200\speak Marlon "Very well, try aiming for my left arm this time."\pause 200\positionOffset Abigail 0 12\pause 200\specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 21 7\playSound swordswipe\positionOffset Abigail 0 -12/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213020/e 262213019/A AdvAbiSpar/w sun: continue/16 29/farmer 14 29 1 Abigail 17 29 3 Sam 15 28 2 Sebastian 16 28 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiMtn 3/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Sam "And that's when Abigail used the Earthbind scroll on the Roc!$1"/pause 200/speak Abigail "I wasn't expecting it to fail that save!$1"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Neither was I...$2"/pause 200/speak Sam "You should join our next game night @.#$b#Stuff like this happens all the time!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "Speaking of time, I've gotta run.#$b#See you guys later!$1"/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 1/speed Abigail 5/move Abigail 10 0 1/warp Abigail -100 -100/pause 100/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/emote Sam 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Abigail's been very busy lately."/pause 200/speak Sam "Doing what? It's not exactly hopping around here.$2"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Whatever it is, she's missed several game nights, and she usually looks forward to those adventures.$2"/pause 200/speak Sam "Band practice too!$7#$b#Do you think something's wrong?$8"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "@, do you know what's going on?"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/emote Sam 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 200/speak Sam "She knows she can talk to us, right?$2#$b#We're her friends, after all."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Whatever it is...#$b#I'm sure she will tell us when she's ready.$2"/pause 200/emote Sam 32/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262213022/e 262213021/t 1350 1430/f Abig: continue/7 13/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail 7 12 3 Marlon 10 12 2/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/emote Abigail 56/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 200/speak Abigail "Oh hey @, glad you made it!$1#$b#Marlon's just checking some things with Gil, and then we'll go."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/quickQuestion #You've been going on a lot of these mine runs lately.#Are the mines getting easier for you to navigate?#Do you still do every mine trip with Marlon?(break)speak Abigail "Yeah. Marlon wants me to get lots of practice down there."(break)speak Abigail "I still get a bit lost sometimes.#$b#But I'm a lot more confident in my sword skills now, so I think I can handle anything that shows up till I find my way back!$1"(break)speak Abigail "Yeah, but he's been taking a more hands off approach lately and letting me lead the way so I can practice."/pause 200/speak Abigail "Most of it's been stuff like gathering ore for the blacksmith, looking for passages, and finding cool junk lying around.#$b#I haven't gotten to do too much fighting with real monsters yet, but he says that'll change as we go deeper in the mines."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/question fork0 "#Have you been seeing much of your friends and family lately?#Sam and Sebastian said you've been pretty busy. Do they know about you joining the guild?"/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "I...haven't told anyone I'm training to be an adventurer yet.$2#$b#My parents would probably freak out, and Sam and Seb might make a big deal about it.$3#$b#This is just my thing, you know?$6#$b#I can make my own choices.#$b#I don't want to deal with anyone else worrying about it.$3"/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "Please don't tell anyone.$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion Should I tell them?#No.#Yes.(break)speak Abigail "Thanks @.#$b#I knew I could count on you!$1"(break)emote Abigail 16\speak Abigail "Seriously?$7#$b#I thought you were my friend @!$5#$b#You helped me get started, and now you want to to sabotage everything I've worked so hard for?$2"\pause 200\emote Abigail 12\pause 200\speak Abigail "We'll talk after the mission.$5"\pause 200\emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Marlon "Alright, have everything? Good, let's go."/pause 200/end/fade

false Monster/warp Si_AA_g1 -100 -100/warp Si_AA_g2 -100 -100/warp Si_AA_g3 -100 -100/warp Si_AA_g4 -100 -100/pause 500/warp Marlon 32 32/warp farmer 34 32/faceDirection farmer 2/fade/viewport 33 32/pause 200/speak Marlon "Are you alright Abigail?"/pause 300/speak Abigail "Y-yeah...$2"/pause 300/quickQuestion #Great job taking it down!#Wow, did you mean to do that?(break)speak Abigail "I, uh...$2#$b#Thanks, I guess.$2"(break)speak Abigail "I...$2#$b#Um...$2"/pause 300/emote Marlon 40/pause 300/speak Marlon "Slaying a creature is never something to take lightly.#$b#You acted in self defense, young adventurer.#$b#And you did so quickly, painlessly, and out of necessity.#$b#You did well."/pause 300/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "Right...$2"/pause 300/emote Marlon 40/pause 300/speak Marlon "Let us return to the surface for now.#$b#I'm sure Clint will understand if his order is slightly delayed."/pause 200/addItem 382 4/addItem 378 5/addItem 535 3/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262213024/e 262213023/A AdvAbiSlay/f Abi: continue/8 6/farmer 13 9 0 Abigail 9 5 0/addConversationTopic AdvAbiTalk 2/skippable/playSound doorOpen/fade/pause 200/move farmer 0 -2 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/speak Abigail "Hi @, what's up?"/pause 200/question fork0 "#I wanted to check on you after what happened in the mines.#Do you want to talk about it?"/stopMusic/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "Close the door please.$9"/pause 100/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -4 3/pause 200/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Abigail "I'm okay.#$b#I just...$2#$b#I guess it's just like before.$2#$b#I thought I'd be ready, I was all set to take down monsters, and I even followed through!$6#$b#But now I just feel so guilty.$2#$b#Like I could have pushed it off and run away instead or something...$2#$b#Do you ever feel like that?$8"/pause 200/quickQuestion #Yes.#No.#Sometimes.(break)speak Abigail "I'm glad I'm not alone in that."(break)speak Abigail "I guess it's just me...$2"(break)speak Abigail "I guess it's something I'll get used to.$2#$b#At least we're together in this, huh?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/question fork1 "#You don't have to deal with this on your own.#You shouldn't bottle up what you're going through."/pause 200/speak Abigail "You're saying I should talk to the others about it?$6"/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/speak Abigail "What if they can't understand?$9"/pause 200/question fork2 "#They don't have to understand just to be there for you.#Give them some credit, I'm sure they'll do their best for their friend!"/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "You're right.$6#$b#I've been trying to go through all this alone to prove to myself that I can do it, but that doesn't mean I can't ask my friends to support me.$3#$b#I'd do the same for them!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "...But let's just start with Sam and Seb, alright?#$b#I'm not sure how to handle that conversation with my parents yet.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/emote Abigail 20/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262213025/e 262213024/A AdvAbiTalk/f Abi: continue/8 6/farmer 8 6 3 Abigail 6 6 2 Sam 7 7 3 Sebastian 5 7 1/addConversationTopic AdvAbiFriends 10/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Abigail "Thanks for coming guys.#$b#I wanted to talk about why I've been so busy lately."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "We were starting to get a bit worried about that."/pause 200/speak Sam "A bit?$8#$b#You used to be down for everything, and now you're busier than Joja ever made me!$8#$b#Did you get a new job or something?$10"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "You did say you didn't want to work at your dad's shop forever..."/pause 200/speak Abigail "Well... Sort of."/pause 200/emote Sam 8 true/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/speak Abigail "@ knows what's going on, and convinced me that I should talk with my friends about it.#$b#So...$2"/pause 200/emote Sam 16 true/emote Sebastian 16/pause 200/speak Sam "Heck yeah, we're your friends!$1"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "You can tell us anything.$7#$b#We are here for you.$1"/pause 200/emote Abigail 32/speak Abigail "So a little while ago, I found out we have an adventurers' guild nearby, and I decided to join up!"/pause 200/emote Sam 16 true/emote Sebastian 16/speak Sam "Wait you're an adventurer?$8#$b#Like @?#$b#That's so awesome!$1"/pause 200/emote Abigail 60/pause 200/speak Abigail "Well I'm still in training.$6#$b#That's what's been taking up all my time."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "That sounds like a lot of hard work.$7#$b#Do you go to the mines a lot?$2#$b#Who trains you?$5"/pause 200/speak Abigail "So you know that old guy with the cape that shows up at town festivals?"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I think my mom knows him."/pause 200/speak Sam "The guy we think has a crush on Marnie?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Yeah!#$b#He's the head of our guild branch, and he's been teaching me loads of stuff."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Huh, so that's how he gets all those monsters to display for Spirit's Eve.$2#$b#Do you help him fight them?"/pause 200/emote Abigail 28/pause 200/speak Abigail "Actually, let me tell you about our mine run the other day...$2"/pause 200/emote Sam 8/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/emote Sebastian 8/pause 100/emote Abigail 28/pause 100/move farmer 0 4 2 true/emote Sam 16 true/emote Sebastian 16/pause 100/message "Abigail seems to have this covered. I'll give them space to talk."/pause 200/end/fade
